privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: JBRtechno is developing a large-scale digital project and is currently recruiting specialists to build the core team. This privacy notice explains how we handle personal information collected through our website, interest forms, and internal dashboards.

sections.title: 1. Information we collect
items: Contact details such as your name, email address, phone number, professional role, and preferred language when you register interest in collaborating on the project.
Project-related information you share about your expertise, availability, or expectations so we can evaluate team fit.
Application materials submitted by candidates, including CVs, portfolios, assessment responses, and follow-up notes from interviews.
Usage analytics and device data gathered from our internal dashboards to keep the platform secure and reliable.

sections.title: 2. How we use information
items: Assess your suitability for roles within the JBRtechno project and coordinate next steps in the recruitment process.
Plan team structure, onboarding timelines, and project delivery based on the expertise you provide.
Operate, maintain, and improve our applicant workflows, knowledge base, and collaboration dashboards.
Comply with legal obligations, prevent fraud, and protect the rights and safety of our team members and candidates.

sections.title: 3. When we share data
items: With trusted members of the internal project leadership team who participate in recruitment, onboarding, or project planning.
With specialised processors (for example: secure cloud storage, communication platforms, or analytics) that help us operate the project under strict confidentiality agreements.
When required by law, regulation, or a valid legal request.

sections.title: 4. Data retention and security
items: We retain candidate records and project enquiries only as long as necessary to complete the recruitment process or meet legal obligations.
All records are stored in encrypted systems with restricted administrative access and ongoing monitoring.

sections.title: 5. Your rights
items: Request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal information.
Object to specific uses of your data or withdraw consent where processing relies on it.
Submit privacy enquiries at any time by contacting us directly.

privacy.contact: For any privacy questions or requests, email privacy@jbrtechno.com and we will respond within two business days.
